title: LOGO FONT
content:
Hi guys!  
Does anyone know which font is used in this logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PDGSoft_web1L_5805.gif)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PDGSoft\_web1L.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032544/http:/typophile.com/files/PDGSoft_web1L.gif) | 4.55 KB |
author: akahdesign

comments.content:
"PDG" looks like **[Futura Extra Bold (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032544/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Futura%20LT%20ExtraBold%20-%20Italic&fid=7ab8d547b62656d7be9ee1e2b9ad3449&fsize=60&text=PDG&wrap=2)**

"PDG SOFTWARE" could be **[Futura Medium (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032544/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Futura%20LT%20Medium%20-%20Bold%20Italic&fid=286f1cb538b37c53b58d044c57414991&fsize=60&text=PDG%20SOFTWARE%20Inc&wrap=2)**

They both look a bit manually expanded
